name: Whigs & Tories: American Revolution
description:
Whigs & Tories : American Revolution (WaT:AR) is a project created by people who have been enjoying the linebattle genre for many years. We believe linebattle gaming has a lot of potential that hasn't yet been unlocked to its fullest. We've been making WaT unpaid since July 2016 some members working day and night to bring what we believe to be the new standard for Linebattle games from here on out:

* Large scale battles with 200+ simultaneous unique players per server
* Multiple factions and regiments with a range of different units available
* A challenging and accurate melee system

WaT:AR will drop you right into the heart of the American Revolution, recreating the feel of how battles must have felt during that time period. We're excited to show you what we can do.

The game is currently in early Alpha testing, and as of this moment offers the following features:

* British and US factions
* A selection of regiments for each faction
* Playable ranker and officer units
* A variety of ranged and melee weapons including muskets, pistols, swords and tomahawks
* An alpha map for general testing

Future features planned for the full release include:

* French and German factions
* Full roster of units, including cavalry, musicians and artillery of different ranks
* A range of different maps with different terrain and weather types
